title: When are the NIOS practical exams conducted? - Quora

response.answer_text: NIOS conducts its examination twice in a year….First One on APRIL- MAY and second one on SEPTEMBER-OCTOBER…..Practical exams occur durin g MARCH for APRIL MAY exam and during August for September October exam NIOS also conducts a special examination known as ON DEMAND EXAMINATION throughout the year …..This special of exam is conducted in metro cities and in regional centers…In this exam you can give exam according to your selected dates and get result within 45 days…. for further information visit The National Institute of Open Schooling HAPPY QUORAing…. upvote and follow me for more information on NIOS

NIOS's Practical Examinations are generally conduct right few weeks before the Final Theory Examination. And the theory exams are conducted in two segments in every year. First in April-May segment and Second in September-October segment.
